comment._content: Two Canadians refreshing themselves from water in a bowl on the ground during the marathon in the 1928 Olympic Games in Amsterdam.

comment.author: 23144340@N00
comment._content: Due Canadesi si rinfrescano con l'acqua da una catinella durante la maratona dei Giochi Olimpici del 1928.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Retro Athlete, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
